snippet: An attempt to recapture some of the excitement of the first days after the opening of the Holland Tunnel is on display through July 1 at the Hoboken Historical Museum.
abstract: Exhibit Driving Under the Hudson: A History of the Holland and Lincoln Tunnels, on display at the Hoboken Historical Museum, attempts to recapture some of the excitement and wonder attendant at the opening of the Holland Tunnel in 1927 and the Lincoln tunnel in 1937 (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: An attempt to recapture some of the excitement of the first days after the opening of the Holland Tunnel is on display through July 1 at the Hoboken Historical Museum.

headline.seo: ‘Driving Under the Hudson,’ at Hoboken Historical Museum
headline.main: When a Road Opened Under the Hudson
headline.print_headline: When a Road Opened Under the Hudson
